name: jet-set
description: A micro library for creating dynamically-static, observable state objects.

scripts.build: npm run makelib && cp ./src/jet-set.js ./lib/jet-set.js && npm run uglify
scripts.lint: npm run lint:src && npm run lint:tests
scripts.qa: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.watch:src: chokidar './src/jet-set.js' -c 'npm run lint:src && npm run test && npm run build'
scripts.watch:tests: chokidar './tests/**/*.js' -c 'npm run lint:tests && npm run test'

author: Phillip Luther
